DesignsSquare.com Block Plus Widget Documentation

ALL-IN-ONE Block Plus/Podcast/Videocast Drupal Module

  • Last Updated: Jun 20, 2014
  • Developed By: DesignsSquare.com
  • Email: contact@designssquare.com
.

Thank you for purchasing our product. If you have any questions, please feel free to email us!

About

This module combines multiple blocks that are common accross multiple themes but not large enough to have a separate widget

  • Video Support - video file upload ('mp4','mov','flv' and most other ) or from Vimeo.com

[INCOMPLETE]Components

Here are the main components of the widget:

  • Post - single post with sidebar to configure left, right or none
  • List of Posts - page listing all posts with sidebar to configure left, right or none
  • Recent Posts Blocks - there are two blocks Ver1 and Ver2 both displaying recent posts
  • Recent Posts Slider - slider displaying recent posts perfect for home page or any section featuring Block Plus

[INCOMPLETE]Installation

In the following are the steps to install DesignsSquare.com Block Plus Widget

  • Copy all modules into sites/all/modules directory
  • Enable module designssquare_com_Block Plus(DesignsSquare Block Plus Widget). This will also enable module designssquarecom_blog_structure
  • Copy designssqure_com_blog/libraries/video-js into sites/all/libraries/video-js
  • Copy designssqure_com_blog/libraries/ckeditor into sites/all/libraries/ckeditor
  • Configure Audio by setting MP3 Audio Players to "WordPress Audio Player" and Auddio Playes Dir to "sites/all/modules/designssquare_com_module_blog/libraries/player" in admin/config/media/audiofield
  • Import Sample Data
    • Ensure Modules - DesignsSquare.com Library: Assets and DesignsSquare.com Library: Alias Path are enabled
    • Enable designssquarecom_blog_example_data that will import sample data and transfer assets such as sample images, videos, etc
  • Revert features - designssquarecom_blog_structure, designssquare_com_blog_data and clear ALL cache

Blocks

Here are the blocks contained in the module

About

There are two blocks - About and About Sidebar both to represent info about company or your person displayed in different regions

Copy Rights

This block is intended for copy rights message displayed in any region

Announcement

The purpose of this block is display announcement assignable to any region

Recent Tweets

The purpose of this block is display last tweets from twitter assignable to any region

Social

The purpose of this block is link different social networks assignable to any region

[INCOMPLETE]Views

Some views may have multiple templates depending of the content type settings
ViewTagTemplatesComments
blog_block_view:recent_posts_ver1 designssquare_blog_block, designssquare_blog_block_recent_posts_ver1 views-view-list--recent-posts-ver1.tpl.php,views-view-recent-posts-ver1.tpl.php view collecting last x number of posts and then rendered in a block available to put in any section on the page. The tag - "designssquare_blog_block" triggers the Template API. The tag - "designssquare_blog_block_recent_posts_ver1" triggers layout(the template file to load).

Hooks

In the following are hooks available to pass content/update content for block
NameHook Name
About hook_ds_about_alter(&$context, $block-id[ds_about, ds_about_sidebar])
Social [@ToDo]hook_ds_social_alter(&$context)
Copy Rights hook_ds_copy_rights_alter(&$context)
Announcements hook_ds_announcement_alter($context)
Recent Tweets [@ToDo]hook_ds_recent_tweets_alter($context)

There is single shared hook available to pass context/update context for blocks

hook_ds_block_context(&$context, $block_id)

Image Styles

Blog comes with the following custom styles used to format sizes of image, video, vimeo in post teaser:
Style NameStyle IDDefaultDescription
DS Image Post Teaser Smallds_blog_img_post_smallImage Post Teaser with format - Smallwidth:370px, height:222px

These styles are applied to for template api - $blog_entry['picture']['content'], $blog_entry['video']['content']. If you don't like to use the styles, the template API contains enough template points to structure your own video,image element.

Note: Setting the width to 1, will make the width to 100%. As result, the outer element will determine the width for post image, video favorable to achieve the responsive effect.

How-To

Blog Index

The Blog Index is a page with list of posts that is the entry point to the widget. It is the list of posts displayed in teaser format.

To create index or page with list of posts, use content type 'blog_posts'. Depending on each particular post format - Big or Small, the post is going to be rendered in that particular format. So, you may have big post and small post at the same time in the list of posts(index). In another words, the format is determined at the individual post level('blog')
It also provides option to choose sidebar right, left or none. The content of the sidebar itself is configured in the context - 'blog_posts'. You should only configure one of the sidebars either 'Primary' or 'Secondary', because it will move all content from one sidebar to another for the sidebar disabled.

Once you have the index(page with list of posts), the posts themselves are assigned via view and context UI("admin/structure/context"). In the context section, edit 'blog_posts' and assign the view - 'DesignsSquare.com: Blog: Posts' to the Content section. To customize the posts you wish in the Blog widget, edit the view - DesignsSquare.com: Blog: Posts itself.

Post

To create post either video, audio or plain text/image, use content type Blog Entry('blog'). There are currently two formats - Big and Small for presenting particular post. It also provides option to choose sidebar right, left or none. The content of the sidebar is configured in the context - 'blog_entry'. You should only configure one of the sidebars either 'Primary' or 'Secondary', because it will move all content from one sidebar to another for the sidebar disabled.

Module determines what kind of post - video, audio, image or plain text in a predefined order. The oder is image/vimeo/video/audio. In another words, if you like to have audio post then there should not be a video uploaded because it will be first checked before the audio for determining the post.

CKEditor

The ALL-IN-One Blog plugin comes with CKEditor(ver 4.4.0) installed and configured along with its most popular plugins. Here is the list of CKEditor plugins:

  • Leaflet Maps
  • Line Utils
  • Widget
  • Code Snippet
  • Equetion Editor
  • Minimal YouTube
  • Greeting Card
  • Google Docs Viewer
  • Fake Objects
  • Table Re-Size
  • Auto Grow
  • Media(oEmbed)
  • UI Color
  • Source Dialog
  • IFrame Dialog Field
  • Developer Tools
  • Background Image for Tables and Cells
  • Configuration Helper
  • Uploadcare: Add media from anywhere
  • HTML Buttons
  • Document Properties
  • Image Enhance
  • Slideshow
  • Flooting Tools
  • Max Height
  • Text Transform
  • Keep Text Selection
  • MrMonkey - simulator
  • Letter Spacing

Important to note, the IMCE is used for uploading assets used with CKEditor

For complete details on CKEditor installation and integration, please, see post - Wysiwyg With Ckeditor In Drupal

Template API

There is common representation API so the layouts(template files) can be swapped out and changed
Content TypeAPIMethods Implementing APIScope
Blog Entry $blog_entry['title']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['path_alias']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['date']['full']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['date']['day']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['date']['month']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['date']['year']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['author']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['path_to_author']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['comment_count']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['has_picture']::[BOOLEAN]
$blog_entry['picture']['url']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['picture']['alt']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['picture']['title']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['picture']['content']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['has_video']::[BOOLEAN]
$blog_entry['video']['content']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['has_audio']::[BOOLEAN]
$blog_entry['audio']['content']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['body']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['category']::[ARRAY](with categories each in its own renderable array )
$blog_entry['category'][N]['#title']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['category'][N]['#href']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['category'][N]['#access']::[BOOLEAN]
$blog_entry['category'][N]['...']::[...]
$blog_entry['tag']::[ARRAY] (with tags each in its own renderable array )
$blog_entry['tag'][N]['#title']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['tag'][N]['#href']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['tag'][N]['#access']::[BOOLEAN]
$blog_entry['tag'][N]['...']::[...]
$blog_entry['contextual_links']::[RENDERABLE_ARRAY]
_blog_entry_tapi($node) node--blog-slide.tpl.php, node--blog-teaser-small.tpl.php, node--blog-teaser-big.tpl.php, node--blog-teaser-big.tpl.php, node--blog-teaser-small.tpl.php
Blog Entry Full ...all from _blog_entry_tapi($node) $blog_entry['about_author']['content']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['about_author']['avatar']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['about_author']['title']::[STRING]
_blog_entry_full_tapi($node, $post_format = 'Big') node--blog-small.tpl.php, node--blog-big.tpl.php
Comment Entry $blog_entry['author']['name']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['author']['avatar_url']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['date']::[STRING]
$blog_entry['content']::[STRING]
_blog_comment_tapi($comment) node--blog-comment.tpl.php
Slide Entry $post_media::[STRING]
$blog_entry::[ARRAY](everything from _blog_entry_tapi())
_slider_media($post) node--blog-slide.tpl.php
Contextual Links $ds_contextual_links['contextual_links']::[RENDERABLE_ARRAY] views-view--blog-categories, views-view--blog-tags, views-view-recent-posts-ver2, views-view--recent-posts-ver1, views-view--recent-posts-slider,

Drupal Module Dependencies

In the following are direct dependencies for the Calypso theme:
  • pathauto: This module required for menu importer.
  • strongarm, features, uuid_features, features_extra all of these modules used for importing structure as well as the sample data. Important to note, that modules uuid and uuid_feature has to dev version of 7.x-1.0-alpha3+15-d or higher
  • audiofield:
  • videojs:
  • IMCE: for artifact upload into textarea
  • CKEditor: for having CKEditor

Troubleshooting

1. Posts does not show up

Ensure that :

  • there is at least one instance of Blog_Posts(blog index)
  • the context import hasn't dropped the view for list of posts(make sure "DesignsSquare.com: Blog: Posts" is assigned to region - "Content")
  • there is no context conflict

2. The Sample Data Exporting with Errors/Missing data

Ensure the UUID and UUID_FEATURES modules have version of 7.x-1.0-alpha3(and above) and 7.x-1.0-alpha5(and above)

3. Video is not displaying.

Make sure designssquare_com_module_blog/libraries/vidoe-js was copied into sites/all/libraries/video-js dir

4. Audio is not working.

Ensure Audio configurations are correct. admin/config/media/audiofield so that 'Audio Players Directory' is pointing to 'sites/all/modules/designssquare_com_module_blog/libraries/player' and setting 'MP3 Audio Players' is 'WordPress Audio Player'
